content.rendered:
Our presentation at WordCampNYC 2015 is now available at WordPress.tv. This presentation provides a great example of why Piklist is the most powerful framework available for WordPress, by showing off one of the newest Piklist features: EXTEND.

Here’s all the supporting material/code you need to reproduce everything in this video:

  • Latest version of Piklist
  • Plugin demoed at WCNYC
  • Presentation Slides
